business_analysis.description:
**Business Summary of Manipal Fintech**

**Business Model:**
Manipal Fintech operates as a fintech platform specializing in gold loans. The company leverages technology to provide quick and minimal paperwork gold loans, making the process efficient and customer-friendly. It offers services both online and offline, including doorstep services where loan officers visit customers' homes to complete the loan process.

**Industry:**
Manipal Fintech is part of the financial services industry, specifically within the niche of gold loans, which is a segment of the broader lending market.

**Key Products/Services:**
1. **Gold Loans:** The primary product, allowing customers to secure loans using their gold jewelry as collateral.
2. **Balance Transfer:** Customers can transfer their existing gold loans to Manipal Fintech to benefit from lower interest rates.
3. **Gold Loan at Home:** A service where loan officers visit customers' homes to facilitate the loan process.

**Market Position:**
Manipal Fintech positions itself as India‚Äôs most trusted Gold-Tech platform. It has disbursed over ‚Çπ16,000 crore in loans to more than 400,000 customers across India, indicating a strong market presence and customer trust. The company is backed by The Manipal Group, which adds to its credibility and trustworthiness.

**Financial Information:**
- **Loans Disbursed:** Over ‚Çπ16,000 crore.
- **Customer Base:** More than 400,000 customers.
- **Interest Rates:** Starting at 9.48% per annum.
- **Company Size:** 201-500 employees.
- **Headquarters:** Gurugram, Haryana.
- **Founded:** 2018.

**Recent Developments:**
- Hosted "Beyond Bullion - Redefining Lending Through Fintech 2025" event, showcasing their commitment to innovation and collaboration in the fintech space.
- Announced new leadership appointments to drive business growth and strategy.

**Conclusion:**
Manipal Fintech is a significant player in the gold loan segment of the financial services industry in India. With a strong backing from The Manipal Group, a large customer base, and substantial loan disbursements, it is well-positioned to continue its growth and innovation in the fintech sector.

basic_info.name: Rahul Virmani
basic_info.search_snippet: Vice President & National Sales Head in Manipal Fintech Private Limited (A Manipal Group Company) ¬∑ Rahul is a seasoned Sales & Marketing, ...

detailed_profile.name: Rahul Virmani
detailed_profile.position: Vice President & National Sales Head in Manipal Fintech Private Limited (A Manipal Group Company)
detailed_profile.about: Rahul is a seasoned Sales & Marketing, Business Development professional with 21 years of experience in BPO/Contact Center in Banking, Financial Service & Insurance /Fin-tech & SME Financing domains for B2C & B2B segments. Expertise in taking up start-ups, successfully setting up & scaling telesales & sales teams for managing third party distribution products across pan india with a team size of 400+ agents through telesales, direct sales & channel partner sales. Responsible for Managing P&L, sales operations, business development, target planning & strategy, decision making, revenue generation, productivity enhancement and data management

experience.title: Vice President- Inside Sales
experience.description: Setting up the distribution network for selling third party financial products. Set up the telesales & sales team of 450+ agents for managing business pan india. Managed business with telesales, channel sales & direct sales team. Responsible for busines volumes, per seat productivity and P&L.
experience.description_html: Setting up the distribution network for selling third party financial products. Set up the telesales & sales team of 450+ agents for managing business pan india. Managed business with telesales, channel sales & direct sales team. Responsible for busines volumes, per seat productivity and P&L. <!---->

experience.title: Area Manager - Telesales
experience.description: Setting up of Insurance distribution network in Haryana & Delhi. Developed, lead & managed a team of 150+ telesales & sales team from scratch to transform the life insurance vertical for the company. Developed telesales, channel sales and direct sales team to sell third party financial products pan india.
